sentence: There is a gym in the spa that is free but you do not have access to the working hot tub steam room or dressing room unles you buy a spa treatment
We did not complain at the spa reception but we did write this on the comment cards
Very little air flow through the lobby created some rather humid conditions which in a crowd is not a pleasant experience3 RESTAURANTS The hours of the restaurants were ridiculously complicated
The elevators were slow one was broken part of our stay and looked like it had been pryed open

Let me start off saying that since we got to the hotel we were taken cared by the chief concierge Diego Primo He took care of our luggage while we were checked in we had arrived early but they explained to us that our rooms will be ready probably until 30 pm but we were able to use the amenities of the hotel while we waited
They expect the lobby bar to be the evening hang out fine but it is 95 degrees with no breeze
The first day we arrived we saw the renovations going on and you basically walk through a small closed off hall by boards to get to the one building that is open
Cons outdated resort being renovated noise dust elevator malfunctions more than twice
I requested a higher room that was quiet with a balcony but we where placed next to construction on the third floor right next to the elevator
Construction going on and you can hear it in your room and it is loud in the lobby
We did not experience any AC problems in our room the beds were comfortable and the amenities were great
I was attending a conference there over 3 days and the service facilities were very good
The activity staff was fun servers were attentive drinks were great and bartenders in lobby bar could n’t have been better
Great place with a lot of amenities

Stayed here for 10nights the room was clean sea view staff ca n’t do enough for you so friendly entertainment day and night so much variety of restaurants the hotel had all the amenities and very central a big shout out to our favourite waiter Alejandro pech for making our nights special top hotel
The activities by the pool the gym and spa were all a bonus as well
Lastly a summary of other misc amenities Main buffet lots of appetizing food
Once getting there they welcome you with refreshing natural drinks or beer and a private chat with your personal concierge explaining hotel amenities and all the adventures they offer in Cancun
Loved the amenities such as the pool places to eat distance from the beach customer service
The spa facilities are relaxing and very reasonably priced
